adv.js:
<input
  {...props}
  placeholder={placeholder !== "-" ? placeholder : ""}
  value={form[name] || ""}
  onChange={(e) => {
    form[name] = e.currentTarget.value;
    if (typeof change === "function") {
      change(e.currentTarget.value);
    }
    form.render();
  }}
  className={cx(
    props.className,
    css`
font-weight: bold;

&:focus {
  border-color: green;
}
`
  )}
/>
{ //local effect }} > {children}
